name: grantAwardList
description:
Common Specification
- If data is in both Japanese and English but only some of items are in English, the items with @sequence tag should have a corresponding @sequence number for the same data in Japanese and English.

children.name: @id
children.description: Unique ID given to each Research Project

children.name: @recordSet
children.description:
Dataset
 = kakenhi : Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (Kakenhi)

children.name: @projectType
children.description:
Project Type
  = area: Innovative Area
  = project: Research Project (default)
  = organizer: Organizer
  = wrapup: Wrapup of Research Output
  = planned: Planned Research
  = publicly: Publicly Offered Research
  = international: Supporting Group for International Activities

children.name: @awardNumber
children.description: Project Number (Unique number within the same @recordSet)

children.name: @type
children.description:
Identifier Type
 = doi: DOI
 = nationalAwardNumber: Unified Project Number

children.name: created
children.description: Initial Data Creation Date (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI:SSZ), ISO8601 format, GMT, with Z at the end

children.name: modified
children.description: Data Modification Date (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MI:SSZ), ISO8601 format, GMT, with Z at the end

children.name: @id
children.description: Parent’s grantAward@id (Parent ID of the Area’s/Group’s Project)

children.name: summary
children.description: The latest Project Information with all submitted contents synthesised

children.name: awardNumber
children.description: Project Number that exists within Research Project

children.name: category
children.description:
System/Project or Category Type Title
Repeat the System/Project element (as many times as needed)

children.name: @path
children.description: Assign value by listing code values of each System/Project in a hierarchical order

children.name: @niiCode
children.description:
System/Project Title Code
Assign code value in order to display the level -> Uniquely assigned code without indicating the hierarchy

children.name: categoryFc
children.description: System/Project corresponding to Research Project (Unique System/Project Title for facet)

children.name: @path
children.description: Assign value by listing code values of each System/Project in a hierarchical order

children.name: @niiCode
children.description:
System/Project Title Code
Assign code value in order to display the level -> Uniquely assigned code without indicating the hierarchy

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Appearance Priority(>=1)
Determine the correspondence of Japanese and English by the correspondence of ‘sequence’.

children.name: @path
children.description: Assign value by listing code values of each Research Field in a hierarchical order

children.name: @fieldTable
children.description:
Research Field Type
  = saimoku: Research Fields
  = jigentsuki_saimoku: Research Fields with a Time Limit
  = tokusetsu_bunya: Focused Research Fields
  = senmon_bunya: Specialized Research Fields
  = zantei_bunya: The Area of Research for the Screening

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Appearance Priority(>=1)
Determine the correspondence of Japanese and English data by the correspondence of ‘sequence’

children.name: @type
children.description:
Research Institution Type
  = academic: Academic Institution
  = industry: Private Company

children.name: @participate
children.description:
Year(s) Institution involved in Research Project
 Involved only in 2000: 2000
 Involved between 2000 and 2002: 2000-2002
 Involved in 2000 and 2002: 2000,2002

children.name: @sequence
children.description: Display Order of Institutions within the project

children.name: @niiCode
children.description:
Funding Agency ID
 = kakenhi : Grant-in-Aid for Scientific Research (Kakenhi)

children.name: @participate
children.description:
Involved only in 2000: 2000
 Involved between 2000 and 2002: 2000-2002
 Involved in 2000 and 2002: 2000,2002

children.name: member
children.description:
Describe Researcher in the order of the following roles
  1. area_organizer
  2. principal_investigator
  3. host_researcher
  4. research_fellow
  5. principal_investigator_support
  x. Other than those above

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Appearance Priority(>=1)
The same Researcher Information in Japanese and English can be determined by corresponding the same sequence value

children.name: @participate
children.description:
Year(s) Researcher involved in Research Project, Year(s) Researcher Information appeared
 Involved only in 2000: 2000
 Involved between 2000 and 2002: 2000-2002
 Involved in 2000 and 2002: 2000,2002

children.name: @institutionType
children.description:
Research Institution Type
  = academic: Academic Institution
  = industry: Private Company

children.name: @institutionType
children.description:
Research Institution Type
  = academic: Academic Institution
  = industry: Private Company

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Appearance Priority (>=1)
 '1' is for main description on Researcher Name, and others for description of other names

children.name: fullName
children.description: Full Name (Insert a en space between Family Name and Given Name)

children.name: enriched
children.description: ‘Researcher Code indicating this researcher’, generated based on the external information

children.name: @type
children.description: Code Type. Only support ‘erad’ at the moment.

children.name: projectStatus
children.description:
Project Status
Output only one attribute except ‘note’

children.name: @fiscalYear
children.description: Set grant@fiscalYear or report@fiscalYear at the time of producing ‘summary’

children.name: @statusCode
children.description:
Research Project’s Status
 = adopted: Adopted
 = granted: Granted
 = ceased: Ceased
 = suspended: Suspended
 = project_closed: Completed
 = declined: Declined
 = discontinued: Discontinued

children.name: keywordList
children.description: Keywords Set (Merge all Keywords appear in the project)

children.name: paragraphList
children.description: Paragraph Set for each Paragraph Type

children.name: @parentId
children.description: Original Parent ID of paragraphList included in ‘summary’

children.name: @type
children.description:
Paragraph Type
  = purpose: Research Purpose
  = abstract: Research Outline
  = outline_of_research_achievement: Outline of Research Output
  = outline_of_research_performance: Outline of Research Performance
  = implementation_schedule: Research Plan (Current FY)
  = progress: Progress to date
  = planning_scheme: Future Research Plan
  = planning_budget_expenditure: Research Budget Plan (Next FY)
  = plan_of_carry_over: Carry-over Expenditure Plan (Next FY)
  = significance_of_research_achievement: Academic Significance and Societal Importance of the Research Achievements
  = outline_of_research_initial: Outline of Research at the Start

children.name: classification
children.description:
Include all ‘classifications’ that has the following ‘types’

1. inspection
2. assessment
3. remark_jigo
4. remark_chukan

For the ‘classification’ that has the following ‘type’, include only the latest ‘classification’

1. progress

children.name: @type
children.description:
Classification Type
  = inspection: Verification Results
  = assessment: Assessment Results
  = remark_jigo: Comments (Ex-post Assessment)
  = remark_chukan: Comments (Interim Assessment)
  = progress: Progress to date

children.name: periodOfAward
children.description:
Project Period
Output only one regardless of summary@lang

children.name: @searchStartFiscalYear
children.description:
Research Start Year for search purposes. Output only one regardless of summary@lang.
If there are multiple summary@lang, adopt "ja" by priority. 
Create from Start Date, Start Year

children.name: @searchEndFiscalYear
children.description:
Research End Year for search purposes 
Create from End Date, End Year

children.name: @estimated
children.description:
Predetermined Flag
  = false: Fixed
  = true: Estimated

children.name: @estimated
children.description:
Predetermined Flag
  = false: Fixed
  = true: Estimated

children.name: @planned
children.description:
Award Amount Flag 
  = false: Allocated Amount (default)
  = true: Planned Amount

children.name: convertedJpyTotalCost
children.description: Converted Total Cost in Japanese yen

children.name: @id
children.description: Unique ID for each data; however, assign the same ID for the same data in Japanese and English.

children.name: @continued
children.description:
New/Continued Section (Deprecated）
  = false: New (default)
  = true: Continued

children.name: titleAlternative
children.description: Research Project Title (Other Titles).　To be used only for search.

children.name: @searchStartFiscalYear
children.description:
Research Start Year for search purposes
Create from Start Date, Start Year

children.description:

children.name: @type
children.description:
Project Details Record Types (codes)
 = jiseki_hokoku: Annual Research Report
 = jiko_hyoka_hokoku: Self-evaluation Report
 = kenkyu_shinchoku_hyoka: Research Progress Assessment
 = kenkyu_seika_hokoku_gaiyo: Final Research Report Summary
 = chukan_hyoka_hokoku: Interim Assessment Report
 = jigo_hyo ka_hokoku: Ex-post Assessment Report
 = jishi_jokyo_hokoku: Research-status Report
 = kenkyu_seika_hokoku: Final Research Report
 = saitaku_shoken: Comments on the Screening Results
 = saitaku_gaiyo: Abstract
 = kenkyu_shinchoku_hyoka_gaiyo: Abstract(Research Progress Assessment)
 = kenkyu_shinchoku_hyoka_genchi_chosa: Research Progress Assessment (Comments on the Site Visits)
 = kenkyu_shinchoku_hyoka_keka: Research Progress Assessment (Result)
 = kenkyu_shinchoku_hyoka_kensho: Research Progress Assessment (Verification Result)
 = tsuiseki_hyoka_shoken: Comments (Follow-up Assessment)
 = tsuiseki_hyoka_jiko_hyoka: Self-evaluation (Follow-up Assessment)
 = tsuiseki_hyoka_kenkyu_gaiyo: Abstract(Follow-up Assessment)
 = chukan_hyoka_shoken: Interim Assessment (Comments)
 = jigo_hyoka_shoken: Ex-post Assessment (Comments)
 = jiseki_hokoku_2: Annual Research Report(2)
 = db_kokai_henko_hokoku: Database Status Report
 = shinbun_keisai_hokoku: Press Release Report
 = kenkyu_seika_hapyo_hokoku: Products Report

children.name: pages
children.description:
Page. Connect the normalised values with a hyphen (e.g. ‘FROM-TO’).
Page. Connect the normalised values with a hyphen (e.g. ‘FROM-TO’). 
If it does not have FROM, describe ‘-To’.
If it does not have TO, describe ‘FROM-’.
If it does not have either of them, the text is omitted.

children.name: parent
children.description:
Parent element of Research Output, on which the aggregated result is based.
Include all without duplicating at ‘@id’ level

children.name: pages
children.description:
Page. Connect the normalised values with a hyphen (e.g. ‘FROM-TO’). 
If it does not have FROM, describe ‘-To’.
If it does not have TO, describe ‘FROM-’.
If it does not have either of them, the text is omitted.

children.description: Date (YYYY-MM-DD). If it is a range, normalise it to (YYYY-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD).

children.name: changeDate
children.description: Approval Date for changing Overseas Institution

children.name: member
children.description: Treat each Researcher as a unique entry and repeat ‘member’ tag

children.name: @id
children.description: Unique ID assigned to each Researcher’s data: however, assign the same ID to the same data in Japanese and English

children.name: @role
children.description:
Researcher Role
  = principal_investigator: Principal Investigator
  = corporate_responsibility: Corporate Representative
  = research_responsibility: Research Representative
  = area_organizer: Area Organiser
  = co_investigator_buntan: Co-Investigator
  = co_investigator_renkei: Research Partners
  = research_collaborator: Research Collaborator
  = research_fellow: Research Fellow
  = foreign_research_fellow: Foreign Research Fellow
  = host_researcher: Host Researcher
  = production_group: Production Organisation
  = host_organization: Host Organisation
  = industry_academia_coordinator: Industry-Academia Coordinator
  = program_manager: Program Manager
  = research_supervisor: Research Supervisor
  = deputy_supervisor: Deputy Supervisor
  = assistant_supervisor: Assistant Supervisor
  = research_area_advisor: Research Area Advisor
  = research_area_management_advisor: Research Area Management Advisor
  = international_advisor: International Advisor
  = international_advisory_board_member: International Advisory Board Member
  = evaluation_committee_member: Evaluation Committee Member
  = research_areas_council_member: Research Areas Evaluation Committee Member
  = research_areas_experts: Research Areas Evaluation Committee Member
  = research_area_evaluation_committee_member: Research Areas Evaluation Committee Member
  = follow_up_evaluation_committee_member: Follow-up Evaluation Committee Member
  = unknown: Unknown

children.description: Full Name (Insert a en space between Family Name and Given Name)

children.description:
Research Institution Type
  = academic: Academic Institution
  = industry: Private Company

Paragraph Type

  = assessment: Assessment Results

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Display Order. Re-arranged the user-defined order by ascending order. 
Positive integer of 1 and over.

children.name: @userDefinedId
children.description:
User-defined ID
ID attribute in common import XML

children.name: caption
children.description: Title of this Award Amount List

children.name: @xml:lang
children.description:
Language in which ‘Title of Award Amount List’ is written.
If the language is unknown, omit this attribute.

children.name: awardAmount
children.description: Data with ‘awardAmountList/awardAmount/@overall=false’ in common import XML for Award Amount(Planned)

children.name: @sequence
children.description:
Appearance Priority (>=1)
Unique value within awardAmountList/awardAmount

children.name: @planned
children.description:
Award Amount Flag
  = false : Allocated Amount
  = true : Planned Amount

children.name: convertedJpyTotalCost
children.description: Converted Total Cost in Japanese yen

children.name: totalResults
children.description: Total Number of Search Results by specified search criteria when xml is acquired via API

children.name: startIndex
children.description: Specified Starting Number of acquired search results when xml is acquired via API

children.name: itemsPerPage
children.description: Specified Number of Acquired Items of search results when xml is acquired via API
